channel.title: [317][DELTA] Removing 'RuneScape' From title screen?
channel.description:
Hello guys and girls :)
I need your help to delete the 'Rune' then the sword and 'Scape' from the title screen I added a picture just so you people know what I am talking about :) [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/3543/stupidstuff.png[/img] Please help me out, dear greetings :)

item.title: [317][DELTA] Removing 'RuneScape' From title screen?
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=lilvamp11 link=topic=500866.msg3663844#msg3663844 date=1310504400]

its client sided.
[/quote][quote author=Adobe link=topic=500866.msg3663792#msg3663792 date=1310502141]

its client sided.

^ I think in the spirits.

Both of these are Wrong if it’s in a Delta Find your “Client Folder” then look for an Image in it,
mines called “oldkoscape” I’m using a Blank Version of Demolishscape, “Delta 317”, Just look for that then Change the Image but keep the Same name, I like to Make a Background go to “Save as” then go to the image and save over it, thus keeping its name, that will sort you’re porblem.
[/quote]Actually, you’re wrong.

The client draws the ‘logo’ from the cache, unless hard-coded/modified. I cannot remember the method name in refactored / non- clients, though, I do know it’s drawn via the cache.

A simple fix is to edit the logo via a cache-editor such as, Tom’s Cache Suite, and simply make the image pure magenta (255, 0, 255)[/quote]
ok i know this Thread is Sorta Closed now, But Anyhow, we’re both right, in a Sence, Cause im going off of my Clients BG image and the RS thing was in the BG image rather then the cache, it all depends on what the Base is and what Version it is like 317…

Read full topic

Both of these are Wrong if it’s in a Delta Find your “Client Folder”

item.title: [317][DELTA] Removing 'RuneScape' From title screen?
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

I Vain I:

its client sided.

its client sided.
[/quote]
^ I think in the spirits.[/quote]
Both of these are Wrong if it’s in a Delta Find your “Client Folder” then look for an Image in it,
mines called “oldkoscape” I’m using a Blank Version of Demolishscape, “Delta 317”, Just look for that then Change the Image but keep the Same name, I like to Make a Background go to “Save as” then go to the image and save over it, thus keeping its name, that will sort you’re porblem.

Read full topic
